attributes.action: To make all dogs legal as long as the owner isn’t teaching it how to be viscous
attributes.additional_details: I have saw something today and it really has made me feel disgusted in the police as to why they seize dogs because they look like a certain breed. The pictures of how the dog looked beforehand and how he looked 11/12 weeks later andunhealthy the dog looked when he was given back. You can get a dog taken off your for mistreating it not feeding,looking after but the police so the same thing ALL dogs are dangerous if you teach them to bite or to fight. I have known more little dogs to bite people.
attributes.background: Stop seizing dogs because they look harmful

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

End breed specific legislation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558354
